title: Rebound
description: Fun-loving Ruth has her world rocked when tattoo artist Daniel steps in on the night she and a work colleague get roofied.Ruth's past means she doesn't trust, she simply can't. She wants someone who has her back as Daniel has, but both have a past and Daniel is clearly on the Rebound.Can Ruth be brave and face her fears to achieve the dream she wants?This is a Sweet with Heat romance, suitable for 18+ with a happy ever after.
author: Louise Murchie
